ygData.subject: FAO Satyric.  Itan the Whistler states his arguement.
ygData.msgSnippet: Satyric, You sound like a necro.  I hope you are not, as I never speak kindly to a bone sucker. I assume that your reference to idle threats and
ygData.messageBody:
Satyric,

You sound like a necro. I hope you are not, as I never speak kindly to a bone sucker.

I assume that your reference to "idle threats and poorly-written posturing" was aimed at myself and my poor deluded friend Zardoz.

ooc: Let me assure you, that if I were to meet him in game, I would engage in much the same banter. This list is a convenient way of extend the roleplay experience. If it offends you, then I am sorry, but in the absence of any rules other than no profanity, I will leave it to the administrator to decide whether or not it needs curbing.
Maybe it is not offense that you wish to confer, but something more akin to mere displeasure. If that is the case then I will make no apology. If this list is going to consist solely of technical questions and ooc communication, then I think it will miss the point of being server specific.
I believe that it should be used as we have begun to use it, but let us see what the consensus of the growing numbers decides.

Poorly written you say? You must excuse Zardoz. Apart from looking exactly like Sean Connery, his mind is not up to eloquent communication of the level which you seek. Indeed, I have had to write to him in a simplistic manner, just so that he can get the general idea.

As for idle threats, I don't think we have threatened each other as yet, so you must mean someone else.

ooc: Please try and join in character. It will help build a strong community on the server, and I hope we'll show those Fennin Ro bods how to
roleplay in EQ.

Itan
